## NodeDocument.eject() method

Reverses the NodeDocument injection from [NodeDocument.inject()](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.inject.md) by undefining the global.document variable if it's an instance of [NodeDocument](./canvas-cleave.nodedocument.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static eject(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
